nodesToMap

public static java.util.Map nodesToMap(java.util.List nodes,
                                       java.util.List attributes)
Convert node list to Map
<item id="1" name="name1"/>
<item id="2" name="name2"/>
...
will be converted to:
{ROW0={id=1,name=name1},ROW1={id=1,name=name2},...}

Parameters:
nodes - The source node list
attributes - Attrbute list to be converted, null means convert all attributes
Returns:
java.util.Map

nodesToMap

public static java.util.Map nodesToMap(java.util.List nodes,
                                       java.util.List attributes,
                                       java.lang.String keyName)
Convert node list to Map
<item id="1" name="name1"/>
<item id="2" name="name2"/>
...
(keyName="name")will be converted to:
{name1={id=1,name=name1},name2={id=1,name=name2},...}

Parameters:
nodes - The source node list
attributes - Attrbute list to be converted, null means convert all attributes
keyName - key name of the Map
Returns:
java.util.Map

nodesToMap

public static java.util.Map nodesToMap(java.util.List nodes,
                                       java.util.List attrs,
                                       java.util.Map searchAttr)
Convert node list to Map

Parameters:
nodes - The source node list
attrs - Attrbute list to be converted, null means convert all attributes
searchAttr - filter such as {id=1, flag=true} will only convert the elements which attibute "id"'s value is "1" and "flag" value is "true√ü"
Returns:
java.util.Map

getElementByAttribute

public static org.jdom.Element getElementByAttribute(java.util.List ElementList,
                                                     java.lang.String attrName,
                                                     java.lang.String attrValue)
Get the first element according to the given attribute and it's value

Parameters:
ElementList - node list
attrName - attribute name
attrValue - attrbute value
Returns:
org.jdom.Element


Example:
Node list:
<item id="1">
<item id="2">
...
XMLHandler.getElementByAttribute(list,"id","1") will get the first element
